template.html.product_name:
UM Full Zip Hoodie Regular Fit
Grey Melange, M
template.html.product_description_short: Unisex full-zip hoodie crafted from a blend of 80% organic cotton and 20% recycled polyester with a 350 gsm fabric weight. The hoodie is enzyme-washed for a smooth, worn-in feel. Country of production is Bangladesh.
template.html.care_instructions:
Machine Wash 60
Do Not Bleach
Tumble Low Temp
Ironing Medium Temp
Do Not Dry Clean
template.html.care_instructions_extended:
Stretch When Wet
Wash Inside Out
Wash With Similar Colors
Reshape While Damp
Wash Separately The First Time
Care Instructions Exclusive Of Decoration
Close All Zippers Velcro Buttons Before Wash
template.html.product_longer_care:
With the following tips for caring for your clothes, you can extend their life and minimize the environmental impact on the care process.

We consciously choose a timeless, neutral design.
Taking into account the needs of the wearer and eco-design in combination with quality materials, you can enjoy optimal longevity.
Wash with a full drum and spin on low setting.
Washing consumes energy but is necessary, by washing at a low temperature you use less energy and it is better for your fabric.
Turn your clothes inside out: by washing your clothes inside out, you protect the outer fabric and it will wear out less.
Air dry your clothes.
A dryer uses a lot of energy; air drying your clothes is less abrasive for your fabric.Z
template.html.lca_disclaimer:
Our LCA calculations are:
- based on date sourced from Ecoinvent Database. The database is regulary updated but the calculations are not actively adjusted at this moment.
- exclusive of packaging and hangtags
- based on the production of one piece in size medium, men's style
- calculated according to ISO14040, but not verified
- calculated with an average of KwH per country, not per production facility
Transportation:
- includes the distance in between each manufacturer (spinning, weaving/knitting, dyeing, cutting and sewing) to the local harbour by truck
- includes the distance between harbours by ship
- The type of truck and ship are not specified
- is calculated up to the warehouse in Aarschot, Belgium
- Transportation of the manufacturing of the trims is not calculated
Don't hesitate to reach out to um@texet.be, if you have any questions regarding our LCA's.
template.html.repairability:
This garment is designed with repairability at its core.
Modular components, standardized seams, and accessible fastenings enable easy repair in case of wear or damage.
Users can carry out basic fixes themselves using a standard repair kit or opt for professional support through certified local tailoring services.
Choosing repair over replacement extends the product‚Äôs lifecycle and maximizes your return on investment in workwear.
template.html.end_of_life:
At the end of its useful life, this garment should be handled in accordance with your country‚Äôs waste management regulations.
Always follow local guidelines for textile disposal or recycling.
Where available, return the item to an authorized collection point or designated drop-off location for professional processing.
The product is designed to facilitate dismantling.
Ensure all parts are clean and dry before disposal or recycling.

‚ôªÔ∏è Labels & Hangtag Components
Inner Labels
All our inner labels are made from recycled polyester.
Hangtag Cord
The cord attached to the FSC-certified paper hangtag is made from 100% organic cotton.

‚û§ Recycling Advice
Both the recycled polyester labels and the organic cotton cord can be disposed of with textile waste, if accepted by your local waste management service.
üìå Note: The paper hangtag should be disposed of with paper recycling, not textile waste.

Thank you for recycling.
Proper end-of-life handling not only reduces environmental impact but also supports circularity in the textile sector.
By recycling, you help give materials a second life and enable the reuse of valuable resources in the creation of new textiles ‚Äî thank you for making a difference.
